import React, { useHistory } from 'react'; import { Link, useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ReactComponent as Dashboard } from '../../assets/images/dashboard.svg'; import { ReactComponent as Jobs } from '../../assets/images/post-job.svg'; import { ReactComponent as Billing } from '../../assets/images/bill-icon.svg'; import { ReactComponent as Logout } from '../../assets/images/logout-icon.svg'; import { removeItemFrmLocalStorage } from '../../utils/genericUtilities'; import '../header/style.scss'; import OneSignal from 'react-onesignal'; function EmployerSideBar() { const location = useLocation(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleLogout = () => { OneSignal.logout(); removeItemFrmLocalStorage(['token', 'currentUser']) navigate("/") } return (
{location.pathname !== '/company-registration' &&
Dashboard Jobs Certifications
Logout
} {location.pathname === '/employersubscription' &&
{/*
Dashboard Jobs Billing
Logout
*/}
}
); } export default EmployerSideBar;
